examples.example: 遇到困难别担心，要相信总会没事儿的，风雨之后见彩虹。

translate.english: Don't worry when encountering difficulties, believe that everything will be okay in the end, and there will be a rainbow after the storm.

examples.example: 无论遇到什么状况，朋友总会笑着说没事儿，然后积极去面对。

translate.english: No matter what situation occurs, friends will always smile and say it's okay, and then actively face it.

examples.example: 当别人犯错向我道歉时，我总是微笑着说没事儿。

translate.english: When others make mistakes and apologize to me, I always smile and say it's okay.
